public class zeta.session.Diag

(source file: Diag.pizza)

   |

                   +----zeta.session.Diag
The pure class interface. 
public class Diag
  extends Message
Diagnostics, a kind of messages representing a set of items carrying a locator, a category, and a description.

Version: $Id: Diag.pizza,v 1.4 1998/12/14 09:34:05 wg Exp $
See also:
Locator

Diag(Locator, Category, String)
Construct singleton diagnostic, containing just one item

Construct singelton diagnostic, containg just one item
Diag()
Construct empty diagnostic containing no items.

add(Locator, Category, String)
Add an item to diagnostics.

Add an item to diagnostics.

Test whether an item if the given category is present.

Return the items in diagnostics.

Return true iff diagnostics are empty.

Category
The class of diagnostic categories.
Item
An item, an element of diagnostics.

Diag
public Diag();
Construct empty diagnostic containing no items.

Diag

public Diag(Locator locator,
            Category category,
            Format message);
Construct singelton diagnostic, containg just one item. The item message is given as a format, allowing the diagnostic to be printed for different line-widthes.

Diag

public Diag(Locator locator,
            Category category,
            String message);
Construct singleton diagnostic, containing just one item. The item message is given as a string. The string is going to be broken at whitespace (\t, \n, \r and \f) if necessary.
